languages.text: Облик мятежников не был примечателен — потрепанная одежда презренной черни, грубые голоса и отталкивающие лица. Однако от взгляда Лорд-капитана не укрылось странное, почти зловещее предвкушение, читавшееся в их глазах. Собравшиеся не богохульствовали, не маялись от скуки, лишь изредка обменивались короткими, неразборчивыми репликами. Замерев, они стояли кругом и взор их был обращен к громоздкой конструкции в центре комнаты.

traits.locale_text: Облик мятежников не был примечателен — потрепанная одежда презренной черни, грубые голоса и отталкивающие лица. Однако от взгляда Лорд-капитана не укрылось странное, почти зловещее предвкушение, читавшееся в их глазах. Собравшиеся не богохульствовали, не маялись от скуки, лишь изредка обменивались короткими, неразборчивыми репликами. Замерев, они стояли кругом и взор их был обращен к громоздкой конструкции в центре комнаты.

languages.text: The rebels were unremarkable in appearance: they were dressed in the shabby clothes of abject rabble, spoke in coarse voices, and had repulsive faces. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.
languages.original_text: Облик мятежников не был примечателен — потрепанная одежда презренной черни, грубые голоса и отталкивающие лица. Однако от взгляда Лорд-капитана не укрылось странное, почти зловещее предвкушение, читавшееся в их глазах. Собравшиеся не богохульствовали, не маялись от скуки, лишь изредка обменивались короткими, неразборчивыми репликами. Замерев, они стояли кругом и взор их был обращен к громоздкой конструкции в центре комнаты.

traits.locale_text: The rebels were unremarkable in appearance: they were dressed in the shabby clothes of abject rabble, spoke in coarse voices, and had disagreeable faces. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes were turned towards the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes were turned towards the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes were turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

languages.text: Die Rebellen sahen unauffällig aus: Sie trugen die zerschlissenen Lumpen niedersten Gesindels, sprachen mit rauen Stimmen und hatten widerwärtige Gesichter. Was dem Lord Captain aber auffiel, war der Ausdruck merkwürdiger, fast düsterer Erwartung in ihren Augen. Das war keine Versammlung lauter Blasphemisten oder gelangweilter Taugenichtse. Nur gelegentlich tauschten sie kurze, unverständliche Bemerkungen aus. Sie standen reglos im Kreis und blickten auf das gewaltige Gebilde in der Mitte des Raumes.
languages.original_text: The rebels were unremarkable in appearance: they were dressed in the shabby clothes of abject rabble, spoke in coarse voices, and had repulsive faces. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

traits.locale_text: Die Rebellen sahen unauffällig aus: Sie trugen die zerschlissenen Lumpen niedersten Gesindels, sprachen mit rauen Stimmen und hatten widerwärtige Gesichert. Was dem Lord Captain aber auffiel war der Ausdruck merkwürdiger, fast düsterer Erwartung in ihren Augen. Das war keine Versammlung lauter Blasphemisten oder gelangweilter Taugenichtse. Nur gelegentlich tauschten sie kurze, unverständliche Bemerkungen aus. Sie standen reglos im Kreis und blickten auf das gewaltige Gebilde in der Mitte des Raumes.

languages.text: Les rebelles ont une apparence somme toute assez banale : tous portent des haillons de miséreux, parlent d'une voix grave et ont des visages repoussants. Mais ce qui attire l'attention {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, c'est leur regard d'attente étrange, presque sinistre. Il ne s'agit pas d'un rassemblement de blasphémateurs bruyants ou de badauds venus tuer le temps. Ils n'échangent que de rares remarques brèves et inintelligibles. Tandis qu'ils restent figés en cercle, leurs regards se tournent vers l'énorme structure au centre de la pièce.
languages.original_text: The rebels were unremarkable in appearance: they were dressed in the shabby clothes of abject rabble, spoke in coarse voices, and had repulsive faces. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

traits.locale_text: Les rebelles ont une apparence somme toute assez banale : tous portent des haillons de miséreux, parlent d'une voix grave et ont des visages repoussants. Mais ce qui attire l'attention {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, c'est leur regard d'attente étrange, presque sinistre. Il ne s'agit pas d'un rassemblement de blasphémateurs bruyants ou de badauds venus tuer le temps. Ils n'échangent que de rares remarques brèves et inintelligibles. Tandis qu'ils restent figés en cercle, leurs regards se tournent vers l'énorme structure au centre de la pièce.

languages.text: 那些叛乱分子相貌平平，穿着卑贱平民的破衣服，说话粗鄙，面目可憎。不过，他们古怪的眼神吸引了舰长大人的注意，他们的目光带着邪恶的渴望。参加这场集会的成员，并不是一群乱哄哄的亵渎者，也不是什么穷极无聊的小混混。参与者偶尔会进行简短的交谈，但你听不懂他们在说什么。他们静静地围成一个圈，目光聚焦在房间中央那件笨重的造物上。
languages.original_text: The rebels were unremarkable in appearance: they were dressed in the shabby clothes of abject rabble, spoke in coarse voices, and had repulsive faces. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

traits.locale_text: 那些叛乱分子相貌平平，穿着卑贱平民的破衣服，说话粗鄙，面目可憎。不过，他们古怪的眼神吸引了舰长大人的注意，他们的目光带着邪恶的渴望。参加这场集会的成员，并不是一群乱哄哄的亵渎者，也不是什么穷极无聊的小混混。参与者偶尔会进行简短的交谈，但你听不懂他们在说什么。他们静静地围成一个圈，目光聚焦在房间中央那件笨重的造物上。

languages.text: 反乱軍は目立たない外見をしていた。貧民のようなみすぼらしい服を着て、下卑た声で話し、忌まわしい顔つきをしていた。しかし、ロード・キャプテンの注意を引いたのは、彼らの目に浮かぶ奇妙な、ほとんど邪悪な予感だった。これは大声で神を冒涜する者や退屈した怠け者の集まりではなかった。彼らは時折、理解しかねる短い言葉を交わすだけだった。微動だにしない輪の中に立つ彼らの視線は、部屋の中央にある巨大な構造物に向けられていた。
languages.original_text: The rebels were unremarkable in appearance: they were dressed in the shabby clothes of abject rabble, spoke in coarse voices, and had repulsive faces. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍は目立たない外見をしていた。貧民のようなみすぼらしい服を着、下卑た声で話し、忌まわしい顔つきをしていた。しかし、ロード・キャプテンの注意を引いたのは、彼らの目に浮かぶ奇妙な、ほとんど邪悪な予感だった。これは大声で神を冒涜する者や退屈した怠け者の集まりではなかった。彼らは時折、理解しかねる短い言葉を交わすだけだった。微動だにしない輪の中に立つ彼らの視線は、部屋の中央にある巨大な構造物に向けられていた。

languages.text: El aspecto de los rebeldes era poco llamativo: vestían las ropas raídas de la chusma miserable, hablaban con voz ronca y tenían rostros repulsivos. Pero lo que llamó la atención {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán fue la mirada de expectación extraña, casi siniestra, en sus ojos. No era una reunión de ruidosos blasfemos ni de aburridos holgazanes. De vez en cuando intercambiaban comentarios breves e ininteligibles. Mientras formaban un círculo congelado, sus miradas se dirigían hacia la imponente estructura del centro de la sala.
languages.original_text: The rebels were unremarkable in appearance: they were dressed in the shabby clothes of abject rabble, spoke in coarse voices, and had repulsive faces. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

Pero lo que llamó la atención {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán fue la mirada de expectación extraña, casi siniestra, en sus ojos. No era una reunión de ruidosos blasfemos ni de aburridos holgazanes. De vez en cuando intercambiaban comentarios breves e ininteligibles. Mientras formaban un círculo congelado, sus miradas se dirigían hacia la imponente estructura del centro de la sala.

languages.text: İsyancılar görünüşte alelade idiler. Adi ayaktakımına ait pejmürde kıyafetler giyiniyor ve kaba seslerle konuşuyorlardı. Yüzleriyse iticiydi. Lord Kaptan'ın dikkatini çeken asıl şey ise gözlerindeki garip, âdeta meşum denebilecek beklentiydi. Bu toplantıyı tertipleyenler, sesi gür çıkan günahkârlar veya sıkkın aylaklar değildi. Yalnızca ara sıra kısa, anlaşılmaz yorumlarda bulunuyorlardı. Bakışları odanın ortasındaki devasa yapıya dönük, hareketsiz bir çember hâlinde duruyorlardı.
languages.original_text: The rebels were unremarkable in appearance: they were dressed in the shabby clothes of abject rabble, spoke in coarse voices, and had repulsive faces. But what caught the Lord Captain's attention was the look of strange, almost sinister anticipation in their eyes. This was no gathering of loud blasphemers or bored idlers. Only occasionally would they exchange brief, unintelligible remarks. As they stood in a frozen circle, their gazes turned toward the hulking structure in the centre of the room.

Lord Kaptan'ın dikkatini çeken şey asıl şey ise gözlerindeki garip, âdeta meşum denebilecek beklentiydi. Bu toplantıyı tertipleyenler, sesi gür çıkan günahkârlar veya sıkkın aylaklar değildi.
